message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'll sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer of $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're close to your limit, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'll make a compromise and offer it to you for $125. This is my final offer.

I'm really interested in the product, but I've already gone over my budget. I'm willing to make one last offer: $120. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to consider buying it from someone else.
